DOC.brief_summary: The aim- To evaluate impact combine oral contraceptive woman 's psychosexual , metabolic , blood coagulation , hormonal genetic measure . Combined oral contraceptive ( COCs ) still popular contraception method . It possible find number publication non-contraceptive benefit , also adverse event . Most research conduct clinical trial , commission pharmaceutical company , order compare COCs different composition . This study set assess role psychosexual , metabolic , endocrine , hormonal genetic measure low dose combine oral contraceptive users- 20 microgram Ethinylestradiol/3 mg Drospirenone 20 microgram Ethinylestradiol/75 microgram Gestoden . Because study commercial , expect obtain valuable objective data - comparative study impact COCs woman 's organism .
DOC.detailed_description: The aim To evaluate impact combine oral contraceptive woman 's psychosexual , metabolic , blood coagulation , hormonal genetic measure . The objective 1 . To asses relation AR polymorphisms metabolic , androgen , blood coagulation parameter sexual function hormonal contraceptive user . 2 . To compare change metabolic , coagulation endocrine parameter hormonal non-hormonal contraceptive user . 3 . To assess impact COCs quality woman 's sexual life psychological state . 4 . To assess correlation sex hormone woman 's metabolic , endocrine , psychological , sexual function . 5 . To evaluate influence COCs blood coagulation parameter . 6 . To determine importance androgen parameter diagnosis hyperandrogenism . Materials Methods Setting׃ The study conduct Lithuanian University Health Sciences period 2013 2016 year . 4 visit proceed study : screening visit 3 additional visit - inclusion study visit , visit 3 month visit 6 month . The screen visit ( 0 visit ) During screen visit woman question routine life medical history . They undergo routine general clinical gynecological examination : 1. height/weight ( BMI calculation ) hip/waist measurement ; 2. blood pressure ( BP ) measurement ant cardiac auscultation ( heart rate ( HR ) test ) ; 3. auscultation lung palpation abdomen ; 4. assessment possible vein varicose leg ; 5. bimanual gynecological examination ; 6. breast palpation ; 7. genital ultrasound examination ass possible anatomical anomaly ; 8. thyroid ultrasound examination . Women meet assessment criterion introduce The Informed Consent Form . Women sign The Informed Consent Form invite come 1 visit . 1. visit Women repeatedly undergo routine general examination ( BP , HR ) . Genital thyroid ultrasound perform . Visual method determine degree hirsutism , originally describe Ferriman Gallwey ( F-G ) , perform . The density terminal hair 9 different body site score 0 4 , total score calculate . In addition F-G scoring , height/weight & hip/waist measurement , record . Hirsutism diagnose case F-G≥8 score . - The woman , present hormonal contraception use contraindication hormonal therapy , one two medicine register Lithuania administered׃ Daylette ( 20 microgram Ethinylestradiol 3 mg Drospirenone ) Lindynette ( 20 microgram Ethinylestradiol 75 microgram Gestoden ) . - The woman , present non-hormonal contraception use , recommend barrier copntraception use ( BCM ) , Natural family plan method ( NFPM ) . Women give fill six questionnaires׃ 1 . General questionnaire , develop author find sociodemographic status ; 2 . Anxiety Depression Scale ( HAD ) - determine level anxiety depression ; 3 . WHO-Five Wellbeing Index ( WHO- 5 ) - evaluate woman 's well ; 4 . Big Five- ass personality trait ; 5 . Female Sexual Function Index ( FSFI ) - find detail sexual life ; 6 . Dyadic Adjustment Scale ( DAD ) - ass compatibility sexual partner . Following blood test performed׃ 1 . Lipogram , glycemia ; 2 . Hormonal analysis radioimmunoassay method ׃ total testosterone ( T ) , free testosterone ( FT ) , sex hormone bind globulin ( SHBG ) , dehydroepiandrosterone sulphate ( DHEAs ) , thyrotropin hormone ( TSH ) , free thyroxine ( FT4 ) ; 3 . Blood coagulation test׃ clotting time accord Ovran , fibrinogen , activate partial thromboplastin time ( aPTT ) . 4 . Total blood picture test ; 5 . Androgen receptor ( AR ) polymorphism test . Patients invite come another visit 3 month . 2 visit Women , arrive 3 month , interwied change well-being potential side effect cause COCs . Women undergo routine general examination BP , HR , height/weight & hip/waist measurement ) . Genital thyroid ultrasound perform . The sign hyperandrogenism assess use F-G scoring system . Blood coagulation tests׃ clotting time accord Ovran , fibrinogen , aPTT ; 4 . Total blood picture test . For use COCs patient consult gynecologist performing study .
DOC.criteria: 1 . 18 40 year old woman apply obstetriciangynaecologist contraception use preventive health care give consent participate study ( sign The Informed Consent Form ) eligible participate study .
